title: Drawing, "Chinoiserie Fantasy", ca. 1780
provenance: Gift given by Misses Hewitt from the Colection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt from the collection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt
description: A tree with two birds upon a pole is shown at left.  A Chinese with a bow is running at its base toward some decayed planks leading to rock.  Motifs of Chinoiserie landscapes are distributed in the middle distance, in the center of which a Mandarin gets his tea on top of a tree.  The zigzag boardwalk leads on from there toward a tent with worshippers before an altar.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Chinoiserie Fantasy", ca. 1780.
ca. 1780. Pencil on paper.. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt from the collection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt. 1931-70-30.
